# Nautilus: Verifiable offchain computation on Sui

Nautilus is a framework for **secure and verifiable off-chain computation on Sui**. For full product details, see the [Nautilus documentation](https://docs.sui.io/concepts/cryptography/nautilus).


```
curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/verify_google_jwt \\n  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \\n  -d '{"jwt":"eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjE2ZDdhYmJhMzgxZTNjMWQyNGZmMDA3MjE3NmE0ZDY4ODNkNTNlZjAiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..zIj35yjvk-sbK8h1xp1lTKqY3wpvGmPbAvsEXGPoR15Rn4Uykj0kITUE_S8UGJ9ijEivCWJ5Da_42GRfP6iBBQyDXpgnHsYB5hVT2D5qOhyID8Usjaz9XThREy7CCtb5Emil89mjhMv8HecX73nlUpvW1yWgFNDvof8jrGNjZDHQl_jfCz4eDaTr20cXdMn7q0vwluSY1rNsvYt5nUZK9tg_UQSGrQQZjq1OUJMUxQh670hmjMqISdx0CvA2wmdeLrCm6_war8dHr57rpl7oQc0s6b3iGMDCmYLPOyv75StqtajsmM9w1WHMIV44-xy0KmwdMr883xq7FetYEPYuoQ"}' | jq
```
